title: After Successful Surgery, Derrick Rose Should Be Back For The Season Opener
text:
After Successful Surgery, Derrick Rose Should Be Back For The Season Opener 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
It seems strange to say, but Derrick Rose is actually pretty lucky his latest injury is nothing more serious than a broken face, especiall...
